title: UEFA Euro 2004 [ENG][PAL][DVD]
description:
UEFA Euro 2004

Published by: Electronic Arts
Developed by: EA Canada
Genre: Sports
Release Date:
US: May 5, 2004
Europe: May 7, 2004
Japan: May 7, 2004

Soccer game, developed to coincide with the finals of the UEFA EURO 2004 tournament in Portugal (June 2004). In UEFA EURO 2004, gamers can play as any of the 51 European nations as you immerse yourself in the deepest championship mode ever released. Players can arrange and play friendly matches against other nations or play through the tournament going from qualifying, to playoffs and into the finals. In addition to tracking injuries and suspensions, a new dynamic morale system will track players\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039; morale, which will fluctuate based on individual and team performances and affect player abilities on the field.

Players: 1-8
Features: Stereo Surround, Memory Card, DualShock Support, Vibration
Size: 1 DVD
